channel.title: Non Profit on Aman Ahuja
channel.description: Recent content in Non Profit on Aman Ahuja

item.title: DataKind SF Bay Area Chapter
item.description: I founded the San Francisco Bay Area chapter of DataKind in 2013, and served as one of the chapter leaders for several years. I helped develop sustainable networks and processes for the chapter, and executed strategies for managing and training volunteers, building and supporting networks of organization-partners, and various operations. I continue to advise and consult with DataKind Global and the Bay Area chapter. DataKind brings together data scientists with leading social change organizations for pro-bono collaborations to improve social impact.
